item.title: Partnership Plan
item.description:
Solution Partnerships Discover scalable and secure solutions that will empower you to achieve your business and client needs with Ocyan Partner Network. Customer ready solutions can be deployed quickly and be extended to your bespoke needs, to accelerate your DLT transformation.
Open Platform learn more Scale as you go No set-up - SaaS Bandwidth cost HTTP API Integration Join Waiting List Enterprise-Ready learn more On-prem Automation On-prem Cloud Service No Bandwidth cost Direct Cloud-Native Integration Contact us

item.title: Getting Started

item.title: Ocyan Features
item.description: Ocyan as Cloud-Native solution Ocyan is a cloud-managed solution that provides all the required infrastructure, automation, monitoring, integrations and analytics, beyond just a Blockchain as a Service, to give organizations the ability to bridge the visibility, ease to integrate and scale across their cloud architectures to any DLT/Blockchain network. Because modern applications are distributed with business operations and data spread across multiple managed services and APIs, automating the required DLT nodes is not enough.
